resources.string: Welcome! In order to continue with the game, you have to allow the location permissions and enable your bluetooth. If you wonder why location permissions, it\'s because the android API needs this permissions in order to return the list with the visible devices.
Please pair manually your phone with your opponent\'s phone and then continue with the game.
One of you has to be the host of the game and the other one the guest. Please choose one option (you should not choose the same option).
Waiting host to accept the join request…
Waiting guest to join the game…
You can play the game now! Enjoy!
